com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast
Interface INumericScalarFunction

All Superinterfaces:
IFilterElement, INumeric, IScalarFunction, ISelectionElement
public interface INumericScalarFunction
extends IScalarFunction, INumeric

Represents a scalar function that operates on a numeric expression. ABS, MOD, SQRT and LENGTH are the supported numeric scalar functions.

Instances of NumericScalarFunction can be created using the methods defined in a INumericField and IStringField. For example, to find the length of a query field, use IString._length()

Since:
0.5
See Also:
IStringField
